home.headline: Discover the sky through my lens
home.subheadline: Enter a world where the roar of jet engines and the elegance of aircraft design come to life. Welcome to my private photo gallery, capturing the dynamic spirit of aviation to EuroAirport Basel-Mulhouse-Fribourg – a crossroads of aeronautical cultures and innovation.

about.headline: About the photographer
about.text1:
Greetings! I am Laurent Greder, an aviation enthusiast and dedicated spotter. My background
                        in aviation photography began several years ago, powered by a
                        deep fascination for these engineering wonders and the stories they bring to
                        across the heavens.
about.text2: Although my main playground is the bustling EuroAirport Basel-Mulhouse-Fribourg, I occasionally capture unique aviation scenes from Geneva Airport (LSGG) and Zurich Airport (LSZH). Each location offers a distinct insight into the world of aviation, from bustling international hubs to serene departures to the sky.
